predicate.note: Frames file for 'command' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entries Leadership and Request.

example.name: all exx in wsj are like this
example.text: The six wines of the Domaine de la Romanee-Conti, 72 of the most precious acres of vineyard anywhere in the world, have commanded three-digit price tags for several years now.
example.arg: The six wines of the Domaine de la Romanee-Conti, 72 of the most precious acres of vineyard anywhere in the world,

roleset.name: impelled action

example.name: do as I say
example.text: Mary commanded John to clean up his room.

example.name: missing action
example.text: John commands an entire regiment of little plastic men.
example.arg: an entire regiment of little plastic men

roleset.note: What he commands them to do, is left unstated. Perhaps for the best.
